poem:
Title: "Imperfections on the Silver Screen"

In the blue light, Victor whispers to ghosts,
Trading secrets under Romantic sighs of Bucharest.
Paranoia - a shuffling dance with images,
A dance only the reel understands.
Yet, in the drama of intrigue, a simple truth:
Each heart pumps strange blood at dawn,
Even a spy's, standing in gray Berlin,
Poised for flight, his secret ready to take wing.
